description:
Nepal made history on Wednesday by electing its first female president. Bidhya Devi Bhandari is a long-time women's rights campaigner, a far-left veteran of the battle to transform the country from absolute monarchy to modern democracy. She's one of only a few female faces in parliament, and she wants to shift the country from being a traditionally male-dominated society, where women are expected to work only at home or on farms, to one in which they have equal rights and opportunities. The new president, however, is not the only communist there winning hearts and minds while changing gender perceptions, as Chris Haslam's been finding out at a somewhat unlikely venue.

Behind a steel gate on a dusty side-street in Kathmandu, there's a rather good bar. It's run by the Belgian consulate and offers a superb selection of rare Trappist beers. It's an odd place to meet Nepal's next sporting super star, a former child soldier, who ran away from home to escape a life of repression and has since risen to the top of one of the most extreme sports on earth.

Two things strike you upon meeting this young athlete. First, there are those eyes, twinkling with self-amusement. It's an absurd life. Secondly, there's the fact that Mira Rai is a woman.

Nepal has a shocking record on gender equality. The World Economic Forum puts the Himalayan Republic 121st out of 136 countries in the global gender-gap index, and women here are considered Paraya Dhan, or "someone else's property". Violence against women is rife and Nepal's long-awaited new constitution denies unmarried females the right to pass on their citizenship to their children. 

声明：音视频均来自互联网链接，仅供学习使用。本网站自身不存储、控制、修改被链接的内容。“沪江英语”高度重视知识产权保护。当如发现本网站发布的信息包含有侵犯其著作权的链接内容时，请联系我们，我们将依法采取措施移除相关内容或屏蔽相关链接。>>零基础直达流利生活口语班<<

title: 谁爱风流高格调（有声）

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

 

斯汀·比伯（Justin Bieber），1994年3月1日出生于加拿大斯特拉特福，加拿大歌手。

 2008年，贾斯汀·比伯被其经纪人斯科特在YouTuBe发现，随后被亚瑟小子培养进入歌坛。 2009年发行第一张个人专辑《My World》。 2010年，贾斯汀·比伯获得美国AMA音乐奖年度艺人。2011年，贾斯汀·比伯和赛琳娜·戈麦斯相恋。

2013年，比伯发行现场专辑《Believe Acoustic》，并凭借专辑《Believe》获得了第40届AMA全美音乐奖最佳艺人奖。

The only problem was with you and not them

And tried to make me forget where I came from

title: 英文歌曲天天唱：Love yourself

description:
《英文天天写》是沪江社团一档写作类社刊，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江社团订阅本社刊！

               

话题：

Writing: imagine a scenario or express your opinion
Changes
Changes refer to things which are no longer how they were used to be. What are the changes? What caused these changes? What will be the outcome?
This week's topic: They confirm the changes... (90-110 words)

Suggestions:
1) changes to the weather pattern
2) changes in the government structure
3) changes in the standand of living
4) changes in social structure
5) Instead of writing a scenario, feel free to comment on the story below.

范例1：

Stepping outside, Hodge closed the door behind him, leaving the interior designer alone in the club office. The designer casually looked around the office; everything looked pretty much the same as the last time he was here. Then again, a lot of things looked similar with a brief glance. It was with detailed examination that made subtle changes obvious. The designer picked up the cup of coffee and took a sip. As he was leaning forward to set the cup back down on the saucer, he reached a hand out towards the underside of the desk.

description:
《BBC英音模仿秀》是沪江社团的原创口语社刊，主持人对音频进行重点讲解和示范模仿，并对大家递交的口语模仿作品进行一对一的点评哦！

今日主持人：苏殷歉

10秒音频：

模仿文本：

She was a banker, but in 2004 she decided to change her career and concentrate on cooking. She just published Korean Food Made Simple, and we'll cook the perfect kimchi fried rice.她曾是个银行家，但是在2004年她决定改变职业规划，将精力集中在烹饪上。她刚发行了新书“制作简单的韩国料理”，今天我们将做一道完美的泡菜炒饭。

语调示意图：

重点单词发音讲解： 

publish[ˈpʌblɪʃ] v. 出版，发行；发表；公布
kimchi ['kimtʃi:] n. (= kimchee)【韩】韩国泡菜

description:

今日主持人：暮雨遗笙

10秒音频：

小编模仿音频： 

模仿文本： We don't wanna go too far too fast because the customer might not be expecting that. There's a learning curve that has to take place.我们不想太过超前，因为这可能并非消费者所期望的。（消费者态度的转变）需要经过一定的学习过程。”

重点单词发音讲解：

重点单词发音图解：

We don't wanna go too far too fast

 because the customer might not be expecting that. 

There's a learning curve that has to take place.
